Text: Hi, thanks for the fast downloading, em I have daemon tools and winrar but daemon tools says that there are no iso files, I have unrared it. Help would be apritiated, thanks :)
@BfSniper Click the files (001 etc) and open with Winrar. From there just install like normal.
Hey i just downloaded and mounted the .iso but there is now game install file? help would be appreciated, thanks.
downloaded power iso to help mount the files, but ISO can't mount/open the ".001" file let alone install it. Help would be appreciated... thanks man.

finally got it to PowerISO, it's mounting now. you never said that we had to extract every volume just for ".001" to work. I think you should revise your instructions so that it isn't so trial and error.

It installed but now it is saying "XINPUT1_3.dll is missing from your computer." I've checked the all the files included with installation but XINPUT1_3.dll isn't one of them. Help would be most appreciated, thank you.
